name: Ant Destroyer
description:
Destroy with your fingers all ants that exit on the hole. Tap all the ants that appear on the screen with your fingers, before they leave the screen be very careful don't tap the red ants, they are very dangerous.Save your record in to Game Center! and Have fun with this amazing and funny game.
Key Features:
• very easy to play
• nice 2D graphics
• endless game
• very fun game for kids and babies
• cool ambience nature music
• amazing animations
Great Game Great Fun!!!
